mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.content, m.senderid AS senderId, m.receiverid AS receiverId, m.isread AS isRead, m.createdat AS createdAt, m.readat AS readAt, u.name AS senderName FROM messages m JOIN users u ON m.senderid = u.id WHERE m.receiverid = #{receiverId} ORDER BY m.createdat DESC
mapper.update: INSERT INTO user_last_message_visit (user_id, last_visit_time) VALUES (#{userId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE last_visit_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO messages (content, senderid, receiverid, isread, createdat, readat) VALUES (#{content}, #{senderId}, #{receiverId}, #{isRead}, now(), #{readAt})
